title: Ontology of Continua — Core v1.2.0
description:
Ontology of Continua — Core v1.2.0

This release consolidates the formal foundations of the continuum framework, integrating full axiomatics, universal operators (F,G,H,Q,R,S,U), structural theorems, dimensional dynamics, and the first unified formalisation of complexity within the continuum hierarchy.

Core 1.2.0 completes the transition from a conceptual to a fully generative mathematical structure, enabling reproducible reasoning across physics, chemistry, biology, cognition and meta-theoretical systems.
